local_intent: Detect red_plate, move above it, align, lower until contact, verify contact, place the white plate on red_plate_center, open gripper, retreat and wait.
assumptions: Camera can see red_plate from current pose
red_plate_center pose key is available for placement
coherence_with_global: Follows the GLOBAL_BT transfer-phase steps: detect red plate, approach above it, lower until contact, place, release, and retreat as described in GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
